snippet: A crepe cafe expands; a bakery, candy store and restaurant opens its flagship; and Brooklyn gets a roadhouse, among other news.
abstract: Restaurants Crepes Du Nord, Ducks Eatery, Exchange Alley, Pork Slope and Sugar and Plumm open in New York and New Jersey.
lead_paragraph: A crepe cafe expands; a bakery, candy store and restaurant opens its flagship; and Brooklyn gets a roadhouse, among other news.

headline.seo: A New Chef in Brooklyn and More Restaurant Openings
